    Package Description
    robowars.board

    • Uses of Piece in robowars.board

      Methods in robowars.board that return Piece 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Piece Board.getPieceFromOffset(int offset)
      Returns the Piece from the index, whether it is alive, or not.
      Methods in robowars.board with parameters of type Piece 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean Board.hexIsWithinMovementRange(HexCoord hex, Piece piece)
      Method for checking if the hexagon is within the movement range of the current playing piece?

      Is the hex visible to the piece?
      int Board.relativeDirection(Piece piece, HexCoord from, HexCoord to)
      Method for getting the relative direction value of a piece, called by the Interpreter so robots can scan properly.
